title: mejarm
author: mejarm
content: It's not a matter of being appreciative; rather, it has to do with my personal growth and my pursuit of my life's goals. I started out as an employee who produced sober outcomes. As a result, while I can cover my expenses, it is challenging to satisfy my "wants". I then proceeded to sell services, and everything went well. The result is that I constantly have an issue to deal with and must find a solution for it. Then I moved to the realm of MLM. The outcomes are mediocre, because thus far the distribution of "profits" in the MLM sector has not been fair. The effect is that I have to retain my reputation, no matter what the conditions are, prestige is number 1, to the point where I don't even notice that I can't even afford to purchase milk for my child. The results of my switch to actual business were not awful, but this is where my debts mounted, and I thought the debt statistics were amazing. If you don't pay the interest on your loan, your current assets will be seized as a result. Not to mention being exposed to member fraud and corruption, as a result I went bankrupt owing to a lack of expertise in operating a genuine business. Then I shifted to the HYIP and BO world. The outcomes were fantastic, but that's also where I experienced the extraordinary and never-ending ups and downs, being defrauded despite temporarily being wealthy. Just flourished briefly before having to restart. The result is that when friends, coworkers, or family members visit us and initially worship us as gods due to our steady profits, when a scam happens, everyone curses it out. I feel like giving up right now. Since I can now make bitcoin funds and undoubtedly get a great deal of information and insight from this group with the correct trade knowledge, I am now really glad to have found it. My life has entirely transformed from how it was before thanks to bitcoin, which has taught me to dream big. I truly like being a part of this community since it allows me to accumulate bitcoins.

I have no idea how this helped you. But even so, Bitcoin has really helped a lot by coming to this field.

comments.author: Weezenhofnar
comments.body: It's inspiring to hear how Bitcoin has transformed your life and taught you to dream big. Your journey through various business ventures and financial hardships highlights the challenges that many people face in trying to achieve their goals. The ups and downs of HYIPs and BOs can be a rollercoaster ride, but it's great to hear that you've found success and stability with Bitcoin. Being part of a supportive community can make all the difference, and I hope that you continue to learn and grow as a Bitcoin enthusiast. Keep dreaming big and striving towards your goals – with Bitcoin as a tool, the possibilities are endless.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: What actually happened to you, was that you find the "true" product that has no scam connected to it. Something that you can "sell" to people, without feeling guilty that it is a scam. Unfortunately MLM's and Ponzi schemes have followed the technology and they too are using Bitcoin as a payment option for their scams... this is giving Bitcoin a bad reputation.... because the people invested in that... seem to think that they are invested in Bitcoin.
